name: delimiter
description: Represents a character sequence used to separate two statements or parts of a statement

properties.name: text
properties.description: The characters that form this delimiter

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this delimiter was added to the database

name: statement
description: Represents an individual statement made within some text. Consecutive statements form whole texts.

properties.name: delimiter id
properties.description: Id of the delimiter that terminates this sentence. None if this sentence is not terminated with any character.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this statement was first made

name: text placement
description: Places some type of text to some location within another text

properties.name: parent id
properties.description: Id of the text where the placed text appears

properties.name: placed id
properties.description: Id of the text that is placed within the parent text

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

name: word
description: Represents an individual word used in a text document. Case-sensitive.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Text representation of this word

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this word was added to the database

name: word placement
description: Records when a word is used in a statement

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement where the referenced word appears

properties.name: word id
properties.description: Id of the word that appears in the described statement

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

properties.name: style
properties.description: Style in which this word is used in this context

name: domain
description: Represents the address of an internet service

properties.name: url
properties.description: Full http(s) address of this domain in string format. Includes protocol, domain name and possible port number.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this domain was added to the database

name: link
description: Represents a link for a specific http(s) request

properties.name: path id
properties.description: Id of the targeted internet address, including the specific sub-path

properties.name: query parameters
properties.description: Specified request parameters in model format

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this link was added to the database

name: link placement
description: Places a link within a statement

properties.name: statement id
properties.description: Id of the statement where the specified link is referenced

properties.name: link id
properties.description: Referenced / placed link

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index that indicates the specific location of the placed text

name: request path
description: Represents a specific http(s) request url path part, not including any query parameters

properties.name: domain id
properties.description: Id of the domain part of this url

properties.name: path
properties.description: Part of this url that comes after the domain part. Doesn't include any query parameters, nor the initial forward slash.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this request path was added to the database
